nodes.bodyText: These comments can be removed now. The samigo provider is now in samigo, and I'll refactor the SCORM one to live in the contrib project, so there won't be a need to add them here any more!

nodes.bodyText:
I noticed the forums/msg providers were removed rather than moved. Just wondering if this was intentional?
Either way I think this comment can be removed.

nodes.bodyText: Thanks for putting this here for me :)
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,26 @@
+package org.sakaiproject.elfinder;
+
+/**
+ * This is an enumeration of sakai fs types
+ * In the future making this a dynamic enumeration will better support registration
+ */
+public enum FsType {
+    ASSESSMENT("assessment"),
+    ASSIGNMENT("assignment"),
+    CONTENT("content"),
+    DROPBOX("dropbox"),
+    FORUMS_FORUM("forum"),
+    FORUMS_TOPIC("topic"),
+    SCORM("scorm"),
